Class ProportionalLineFollower

  • java.lang.Object
    • Navigation
      • ProportionalLineFollower

  • public class ProportionalLineFollower
extends Navigation
    ProportionalLineFollower, uses the navigation and two light sensors to follow a line proportionally.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEFAULT_FOLLOW_BLACK
      Default value for follow a black line (true).

      • Fields inherited from class Navigation

        MAX_TURNING, MIN_TURNING, TURNING

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProportionalLineFollower(SingleMotor leftMotor, SingleMotor rightMotor, LightSensor frontLightSensor, LightSensor backLightSensor)
      Constructor method, creates the proportional line follower with the left motor, the right motor, the front light sensor and the back light sensor.
